mapper.select: SELECT r.review_num,r.seller_id,r.user_id,r.content,r.liked,r.user_nick,r.reg_date, r.mod_date, a.re_ans_content ,a.reg_date AS ans_reg_date , a.mod_date AS ans_mod_date, a.re_ans_num, (r.rating / 5.0) * 100 as rating_percent FROM review_tbl AS r LEFT OUTER JOIN review_ans_tbl AS a ON r.review_num = a.review_num WHERE r.seller_id = #{seller_id} ORDER BY r.reg_date desc limit #{page},10

SELECT r.review_num,r.seller_id,r.user_id,r.content,r.liked,r.user_nick,r.reg_date, r.mod_date, a.re_ans_content ,a.reg_date AS ans_reg_date , a.mod_date AS ans_mod_date, a.re_ans_num, (r.rating / 5.0) * 100 as rating_percent FROM review_tbl AS r LEFT OUTER JOIN review_ans_tbl AS a ON r.review_num = a.review_num WHERE r.seller_id = #{seller_id} and r.reg_date = curdate() ORDER BY r.reg_date desc limit #{page},10

SELECT r.review_num,r.seller_id,r.user_id,r.content,r.liked,r.user_nick,r.reg_date, r.mod_date, a.re_ans_content ,a.reg_date AS ans_reg_date , a.mod_date AS ans_mod_date, a.re_ans_num, (r.rating / 5.0) * 100 as rating_percent FROM review_tbl AS r LEFT OUTER JOIN review_ans_tbl AS a ON r.review_num = a.review_num WHERE r.seller_id = #{seller_id} and r.reg_date = curdate() - interval 1 day ORDER BY r.reg_date desc limit #{page},10
